snippet: LEAD: Probably no race for Congress carries more symbolism than the one being fought house to house, mailbox to mailbox, in the rolling avocado ranchland and suburban reaches of Santa Barbara and Ventura Counties on California's lush central coast...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Probably no race for Congress carries more symbolism than the one being fought house to house, mailbox to mailbox, in the rolling avocado ranchland and suburban reaches of Santa Barbara and Ventura Counties on California's lush central coast.

headline.main: The Race for Congress; In Reagan's Home District, a Referendum of Sorts

byline.original: By ROBERT REINHOLD, Special to the New York Times
